3: The orb-shaped Corrupted are scattered on the floor, twitching occasionally, the needles within ejecting haphazardly.
An Ascendant would not have made such a scene. If anything, this looks like a crudely made trap.
...Like a warning, asking you to leave.
But maybe they aren't asking us to leave. Maybe they're showing us where to go.
Says Noctis as he moves aside and shows you the wall before him.
The stained, decrepit wall is adorned with a line written in blood-red paint: THIS WAY.
Hahaha! Just like a Golden Age horror film!
